txt.en: 'Look, [placeholder], can you see them? At the very least, you can hear them...crebain. Crows are vile creatures to begin with, but the crebain of Dunland have been corrupted by Saruman and act as his spies.\n\n'We should hunt a few of the wretched birds while we are here in the <rgb=#FFFF00>South Gravenwood</rgb> and rid the world of a few more of the Wizard's spies.'
'Perhaps we should not have deviated from our mission, but I did not feel that we could afford not to take the opportunity to slay the crebain while we were here.\n\n'Thank you.'
Andreg is taking you to meet with Saeradan at the Rohirrim scout-camp; however, he needs help with his own mission first.
Crebain can be found throughout the <rgb=#FFFF00>South Gravenwood</rgb>.\n\nAndreg wants your help hunting crebain to rid the world of some of Saruman's spies.
You should speak with Andreg about your successes against the crebain of the <rgb=#FFFF00>South Gravenwood</rgb>.
